column4: go to the sound control and change the output to digital stereo output
for the video open the gnome-display-properties (aka monitors)
so spdif works and hdmi video is working but when you change the audio output to the hdmi choice in the sound preferences you get no sound
if you have 11.04 just click on the ubuntu icon in the top left and type in the command name/whatever you are looking for and it will list possibilities
